Detailed Description

Offers the functions to create and to work with radial basis function networks.

Definition in file RBFNet.h.

Function Documentation

std::ostream& operator<< ( std::ostream &  os,
RBFNet &  net 
) [inline]

Writes a network to the output stream "os".

The number of input, output and hidden neurons and also the center, variance, weights and bias matrices are written to the output stream os.

Parameters:
os The output stream.
net The net that will be written to the output stream.
Returns:
Reference to the output stream.
Author:
L. Arnold
Date:
2002
Changes
none
Status
stable

std::istream& operator>> ( std::istream &  is,
RBFNet &  net 
) [inline]

Reads a network from the input stream "is".

The number of input, output and hidden neurons, and also the center, variance, weight and bias matrices are read from the input stream is, memory for the internal net data structures is reserved and the weight and bias values are written to the parameter vector ModelInterface::w.

Parameters:
is The input stream.
net The net that will be read in.
Returns:
Reference to the input stream.
Author:
L. Arnold
Date:
2002
Changes
none
Status
stable
